title: Obby Survive Parkour
description:
Do you have what it takes to traverse colorful yet dangerous landscapes? InObby Survive Parkour, there is no time to think â¼ only to act fast as you face thrilling challenges at every step. Enter the ultimate Squid Game-themed playground, packed with dangerous traps and obstacles, all brought to life with high-quality 3D graphics. Get ready to enter a high-stakes adventure where one wrong move could cost you everything!
Run, jump, parkour â¼ survive! Thatâs all you need to do inObby Survive Parkour. It might sound easy, but every step hides imminent danger. Youâll need sharp reflexes and the right skills to reach the finish line â¼ and every coin you collect brings you closer to unlocking surprises.The games of life and death await! Whether you want to traverse dangerous landscapes alone to test and train your reflexes, or challenge a friend to prove whoâs faster, this game has it all. Choose between single-player survival runs or offline multiplayer mode. Nevertheless, the goal remains the same: run, jump and survive!
Start playing solo anytime to get used to the thrilling yet threatening, obstacle-filled race.
Beware!The path to the finish line is packed with many hazards such as lava rivers, tsunami waves, avalanche storms, rolling snowballs, and the classics 'Red Light, Green Light.'The goal is simple:survive until the end without being hit by environmental threats, falling, or getting eliminated by hidden dangers.
The gameplay is very intuitive.
Grab a friend and jump into this multiplayer mode, where youâll go head-to-head in a game full of competitive excitement. Both of you will race through the same obstacle-filled landscape, facing the same traps. To spice things up, youâll also get access to power-ups likeFreeze,Bomb, andFast Run.
First Player Controls
Second Player Controls
There are a variety of power-ups available for the player to choose from in the game. Below is a list of some of them.
FreezeÂFreezes your opponents for a short duration, preventing them from moving. Use this power-up at the start of the game to get a head start while your competitors are left behind.
BombÂDetonates a bomb that eliminates nearby players. Only those within one block of you will be affected, but they will respawn after 3-4 seconds. Use this window to gain the upper hand in the race.
SpeedÂDoubles your running speed, allowing you to quickly get ahead of your competitors. Be careful! This power-up makes precise movements harder, especially when turning left or right.
Obby Survive Parkour is compatible with both iOS and Android devices, allowing players to enjoy the game anywhere, anytime.Â
The multiplayer mode is easy to set up. Players simply need a device such as a computer or laptop and select the two-player mode. This will create a split screen, allowing both players to enjoy the game using their own controls.
Already won the race? If youâre ready to take on new dangerous environments, there are plenty of options to choose from. Be sure to check outStickman ParkourorObby Tower Parkour Climb. Both games deliver adrenaline-filled parkour where one wrong move means itâs game over!
short_description: Obby Survive Parkour: run, jump, and survive thrilling obstacle courses solo or with a friend. One wrong move and itâs game over!

title: Geometry Jump
description:
For those players who are obsessed with Geometry Dash, we have another spin-off that will drive you mad! InGeometry Jumpgame, stop counting your attempts and focus on the rhythm instead. Break into the a world with all kinds of geometric shapes, spikes, chainsaws, rocket ships and many more. Seemingly, you have one job, and that's jumping! But it's hard to master. Let's see if you can handle this hurdle of obstacles!
Jump:Tap, click or press spacebar to jump over obstacles
Explore the in-game shop to discover 45 unlockable characters in Geometry Jump! Each character has a unique design and adds a fun twist to your gameplay. Collect them all as you progress through levels and customize your experience!
GM Media created Geometry Jump.
Geometry Jumpis a great game to sharpen reflexes and improve spatial awareness and quick adaptation. But the difficult gameplay requires both intense focus and hand-eye coordination. So, we suggest you take breaks at least every 10 minutes to reduce the possibility of burnout and eye strain.
If you enjoyGeometry Jump, you might also enjoy other obstacle games on OnlineGames.io. One alternative isGeometry Rash. Play it online, and let us know what you think in the comments section below!

title: Rainbow Survival
description:
Rainbow Survivalis a funny online FPS game that blends humor, color, and action in a wacky world. In this browser game, you'll be chased by quirky, colorful monsters that are more mischievous than they appear. Armed with a simple weapon, you'll need sharp reflexes and precision to defeat waves of foes and restore the rainbow to its rightful place in the sky!
The colorful, once-beautiful rainbow is now cursed, and each color has transformed into a mischievous monster. As the brave hero of Pixelville, it's up to you to defeat these funny foes to restore the rainbow's beauty.
Once upon a time, in the colorful world of Pixelville, there was a magical rainbow that stretched across the sky every day, spreading joy to everyone below. But one dark night, an evil wizard, tired of all the happiness, cast a curse on the rainbow. Each color of the rainbow turned into a monster!Â In this whimsical land, the colors took on their new, funny forms:
A brave kid (that's you!) with a big heart and an even bigger laugh decided to take action. Armed with a simple gun, which becomes more powerful as you progress, your mission is to defeat these colorful creatures and break the curse. With each defeated foe, the rainbow slowly returns to its former glory, restoring peace to Pixelville!
Rainbow Survival was developed by G55 CO.
If you enjoyed Rainbow Survival, be sure to check outFunny Shooter Bro, another funny FPS game. You can also find more funny games on OnlineGames.io and explore other browser games to enjoy!
short_description: Join the fun in Rainbow Survival, an online FPS where you battle colorful monsters to break a magical curse and restore the rainbow.

title: Vehicles Simulator 2
description:
Nervous before your driving test? You should play Vehicles Simulator 2 for some practice. Vehicles Simulator 2 is a web-based driving game where you can test your driving skills. Whether you'd like to drive a buggy, pickup truck or even a war tank, this game will give you the mechanics you've been looking for in a realistic driving game. Let's jump on to features and how to play the game.
The fastest car in Vehicles Simulator 2 is the Buggy car. Even though the car is more fragile and easy to flip over compared to the other vehicles, it accelerates very quickly thanks to its lightweight.
The Haul Truck is the most difficult vehicle to manage. To enter it, choose the second track and look behind you where you spawned. It is hard not to see it. Approach and press T. Be an operator and control this giant machine.Â
A good driver always checks the indicators. Here are them to keep track on the left side of your screen while driving in Vehicles Simulator 2.
So, you're a fan of realistic rides? Give a chance toCoach Bus Drive Simulatorand transport passenger safe and sound to their destinations. They trust in you.
If you'd like to see your other options on free-to-play vehicle games without download, a vast catalog awaits you indriving games.Â

title: Viola the Bird
description:
Jam with the world's first bird-tuoso! MeetViola the Bird, a feathered musician (okay, she's actually an ostrich!). She loves plucking strings and playing cellos. In this online music game created by David Li and Google collaboratively, you'll help Viola play famous classical songs on her cello.
She might sometimes flub a note or twoâbut hey, it's in her bird instincts! ð Viola always says that her goal is to go from chirping in the wild to rocking out in the Broadway Concerts. So, help her spread her wings, pluck those strings! Whether you're into composing or just love making noise, Viola the Bird will give you the fun and sounds you've been looking for! The game is like an experimental lab for music, and it is definitely a must-play!
Viola the Bird isn't just about random chirps and tweets; you can play some seriously epic songs! Here's a list of songs you can perform in the game:
And if you're feeling creative, you can go freestyle by pressing the button at the top of your screen! Experiment with different notes to create your own masterpiece. Ostrichs, unfortunately, cannot fly, but you can let your imagination fly!
Viola the Bird was created by David Li and Google Arts & Culture.
July 2023
